dublin_core.dcvalue: The aim of this study was to evaluate the visual acuity scores of a computer based visual function testing CVFT system The automated chart uses logMAR notation logarithm of the minimum angle of resolution and randomised tilting E as optotype The test was conducted using a laptop computer
Clinical And experimental optometry : journal of the Australian Optometrical Association
Automated determination of distance visual acuity: towards teleophthalmology services.
